Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Device information and control

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device
StringReg.Description: Version of the firmware in the device

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor

EnumEntry.Name: Areascan
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that the camera has an area scan sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that the camera uses an area scan sensor.

Integer.Name: DeviceMaxThroughput
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum bandwidth of the data that can be streamed out of the device
Integer.Description: Maximum bandwidth of the data that can be streamed out of the device

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device and to put it in its power up state
Command.Description: Resets the device and to put it in its power up state

Command.Name: DeviceRegistersStreamingStart
Command.ToolTip: Prepare the device for registers streaming without checking for consistency
Command.Description: Prepare the device for registers streaming without checking for consistency

Command.Name: DeviceRegistersStreamingEnd
Command.ToolTip: Announce the end of registers streaming
Command.Description: Announce the end of registers streaming

Command.Name: DeviceRegistersCheck
Command.ToolTip: Perform the validation of the current register set for consistency
Command.Description: Perform the validation of the current register set for consistency

Boolean.Name: DeviceRegistersValid
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns if the current register set is valid and consistent
Boolean.Description: Returns if the current register set is valid and consistent

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image
Integer.Description: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image
Integer.Description: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels)
Integer.Description: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels)

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels)
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels)

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels)
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels)

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels)
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels)

Integer.Name: BinningHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together
Integer.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together

Integer.Name: BinningVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together
Integer.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together

Integer.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image
Integer.Description: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image

Integer.Name: DecimationVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical sub-sampling of the image
Integer.Description: Vertical sub-sampling of the image

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device
Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition

Enumeration.Name: SensorTaps
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of taps of the camera sensor
Enumeration.Description: Number of taps of the camera sensor

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists gain controls available for selection
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all channels
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all channels

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the red channel
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the red channel

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the green channel
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the green channel

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the blue channel
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the blue channel

EnumEntry.Name: Tap1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to tap 1
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to tap1

EnumEntry.Name: Tap2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to tap 2
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to tap 2

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value in dB (decibels)
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value in dB (decibels).

Float.Name: GainAbs
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value in dB (decibels)
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value in dB (decibels).

Integer.Name: GainRaw
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as a raw value in percent (%)
Integer.Description: Controls the selected gain as a raw value in percent (%).

Float.Name: GainGreenBCoef
Float.ToolTip: Controls the GainGreenBCoef value (GreenBGain = GreenRGain * GainGreenBCoef)
Float.Description: Controls the GainGreenBCoef value (GreenBGain = GreenRGain * GainGreenBCoef).

Enumeration.Name: GainAutoBalance
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode for automatic gain balancing
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode for automatic gain balancing between sensor taps

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain tap balancing is manually controlled using Gain
EnumEntry.Description: Gain tap balancing is manually controlled using Gain

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain tap balancing is done once
EnumEntry.Description: Gain tap balancing is done once by device and then returns to Off state

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain tap balancing is constantly adjusted by device
EnumEntry.Description: Gain tap balancing is constantly adjusted by device

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to the red channel
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to the red channel

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to the green channel
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to the green channel

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to the blue channel
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to the blue channel

EnumEntry.Name: Tap1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to tap 1
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to tap 1

EnumEntry.Name: Tap2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to tap 2
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to tap 2

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value

Float.Name: BlackLevelAbs
Float.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value

Integer.Name: BlackLevelRaw
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as a percent (%)
Integer.Description: Controls the analog black level as a percent (%)

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelAutoBalance
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode for automatic black level balancing
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode for automatic black level balancing between sensor taps

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black level tap balancing is manually controlled using BlackLevel
EnumEntry.Description: Black level tap balancing is manually controlled using BlackLevel

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black level tap balancing is done once
EnumEntry.Description: Black level tap balancing is done once by device and then returns to Off state

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black level tap balancing is constantly adjusted by device
EnumEntry.Description: Black level tap balancing is constantly adjusted by device

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped

EnumEntry.Name: SingleFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One frame is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: One frame is captured

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured
EnumEntry.Description: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame

Command.Name: AcquisitionAbort
Command.Description: This will end the capture without completing the current Frame or waiting on a trigger.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode

Integer.Name: AcquisitionBurstFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateAbs
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionStatusSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus
Enumeration.Description: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector
Boolean.Description: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the acquisition start trigger
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the acquisition start trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the frame start trigger
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the frame start trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the frame burst start trigger
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the frame burst start trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the modes available for the selected trigger
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration provides a list of the values available for setting the trigger mode for the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the mode for the selected trigger to off
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the mode for the selected trigger to off.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the mode for the selected trigger to on
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the mode for the selected trigger to on.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates a software trigger signal that is used when the trigger source is set to 'software'
Command.Description: This command generates a software trigger signal. The software trigger signal will be used if the trigger source is set to 'software'.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the available sources for the selected trigger
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration lists the available trigger sources for the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the source for the selected trigger to line 1
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the source for the selected trigger to line 1.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the source for the selected trigger to line 2
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the source for the selected trigger to line 2.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the software trigger as the source for the selected trigger
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the source for the selected trigger to software trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the trigger activation types available for the selected trigger
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration lists the trigger activation types available for the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the selected trigger signal to be active on rising edge
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the trigger to be active on rising edge.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the selected trigger signal to be active on falling edge
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the trigger to be active on falling edge.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it

Float.Name: TriggerDebouncerTime
Float.ToolTip: Specifies trigger debouncer time in microseconds (us)
Float.Description: Specifies trigger debouncer time in microseconds (us)

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter)
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter)

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime
EnumEntry.Description: The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses the width of the current trigger signal pulse to control the exposure duration
EnumEntry.Description: Uses the width of the current trigger signal pulse to control the exposure duration

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time (in us) when ExposureMode is Timed
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time (in us) when ExposureMode is Timed

Float.Name: ExposureTimeAbs
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time (in us) when ExposureMode is Timed
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time (in us) when ExposureMode is Timed

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the digital input and output control features

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the output line of the external device connector to configure
Enumeration.Description: Selects the output line of the external device connector to configure

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects output line 1
EnumEntry.Description: Selects output line 1

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects output line 2
EnumEntry.Description: Selects output line 2

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects input line 1
EnumEntry.Description: Selects input line 1

EnumEntry.Name: Line4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects input line 2
EnumEntry.Description: Selects input line 2

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the invertion of the signal of the selected input or output Line
Boolean.Description: Controls the invertion of the signal of the selected input or output Line

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame
EnumEntry.Description: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTriggerBusy
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is busy and new triggers are not accepted
EnumEntry.Description: Device is busy and new triggers are not accepted

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many Frames
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many Frames

EnumEntry.Name: FrameTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a Frame trigger
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a Frame trigger

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing the capture of a Frame
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing the capture of a Frame

Enumeration.Name: LineFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical output line
Enumeration.Description: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical output line

Float.Name: LineDebouncerTime
Float.ToolTip: Specifies line debouncer time in microseconds (us)
Float.Description: Specifies line debouncer time in microseconds (us)

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the user settable output signals available for selection
Enumeration.Description: Lists the user settable output signals that are available for selection.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the bit 1 of the User Output register
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the bit 1 of the User Output register

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the bit 2 of the User Output register
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the bit 2 of the User Output register

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the User Set control features

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting User Set
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting User Set

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the first User Set
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the first User Set

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the second User Set
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the second User Set

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefaultSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load when the device is reset
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active when the device is reset

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting User Set
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting User Set

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the first User Set
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the first User Set

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the second User Set
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the second User Set

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Saves the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device
Command.Description: Saves the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device

Category.Name: TapBalanceParameters
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains Tap Balance algorithm parameters

Integer.Name: TbpVerticalStep
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical step used in Tap Balance algorithm
Integer.Description: Vertical step used in Tap Balance algorithm

Integer.Name: TbpFramesToAvg
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames averaged and used in Tap Balance algorithm
Integer.Description: Determines how many frames will be used to calculate average pixel values per tap

Float.Name: TbpPixelDiffTreshold
Float.ToolTip: Maximum difference between adjacent pixels on different taps to include them in calculation
Float.Description: Determines the maximum difference between adjacent pixels on different taps to include them in calculation

Float.Name: TbpTapDiffTreshold
Float.ToolTip: Determines the maximum allowed difference between taps
Float.Description: Determines the maximum allowed difference between taps

Float.Name: TbpTapDiffTresholdPercent
Float.ToolTip: Determines the maximum allowed difference between taps in percentage
Float.Description: Determines the maximum allowed difference between taps in percentage

Float.Name: TbpTapDiffTresholdBL
Float.ToolTip: Determines the maximum allowed black level difference between taps
Float.Description: Determines the maximum allowed black level difference between taps

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Transport layer control features

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image on the stream channel
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image on the stream channel

Enumeration.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which physical network interface to control
Enumeration.Description: Selects which physical network interface to control

EnumEntry.Name: NetworkInterface0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects network interface 0 for configuration
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects network interface 0 for configuration. Once a network interface has been selected, all the configurations will be applied to the selected interface.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the specification
Integer.Description: Major version of the specification

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the specification
Integer.Description: Minor version of the specification

Integer.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Integer.ToolTip: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers
Integer.Description: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: MAC address of the network interface
Integer.Description: MAC address of the network interface

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the IP address for the given network interface
Integer.Description: Reports the IP address for the given network interface

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the subnet mask of the given interface
Integer.Description: Provides the subnet mask of the given interface

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface
Integer.Description: Indicates the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the Persistent IP address for this network interface
Integer.Description: Indicates the Persistent IP address for this network interface

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface
Integer.Description: Indicates the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the persistent default gateway for this network interface
Integer.Description: Indicates the persistent default gateway for this network interface

Integer.Name: GevLinkSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the speed (Mbps) of transmission negotiated by the given network interface
Integer.Description: Indicates the speed (Mbps) of transmission negotiated by the given network interface

StringReg.Name: GevFirstURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file
StringReg.Description: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file

StringReg.Name: GevSecondURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the second URL to the XML device description file
StringReg.Description: Indicates the second URL to the XML device description file

Integer.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device

Integer.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second (frequency in Hz)
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second (frequency in Hz).

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue
Command.Description: Latches current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatchReset
Command.ToolTip: Latches and then Resets the Timestamp counter to 0
Command.Description: Latches and then Resets the Timestamp counter to 0

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter
Integer.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter

Enumeration.Name: GevCCP
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the device access privilege of an application
Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application

Enumeration.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control
Enumeration.Description: Selects the stream channel to control

Integer.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Index of network interface to use
Integer.Description: Index of network interface to use

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the port to which the device must send data stream
Integer.Description: Indicates the port to which the device must send data stream

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream
Boolean.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size in bytes to send on this channel
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size in bytes to send on this channel

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the destination IP address for this stream channel
Integer.Description: Indicates the destination IP address for this stream channel

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCFTD
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the frame transfer start delay (in ticks) for the selected stream channel.
Integer.Description: This value sets a delay between Frame or First Packet of a Frame is ready until actual data transfer over transport protocol is started.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_Version
MaskedIntReg.Description: Version of the GigE Standard with which the device is compliant The two most-significant bytes are allocated to the major number of the version, the two least-significant bytes for the minor number.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_Version_MAJORVERSION
MaskedIntReg.Description: This field represents the major version of the specification. For instance, GigE Vision version 1.0 would have the major version set to 1.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_Version_MINORVERSION
MaskedIntReg.Description: This field represents the minorr version of the specification. For instance, GigE Vision version 1.0 would have the minor version set to 0.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_DeviceMode
MaskedIntReg.Description: This register indicates the character set used by the various strings present in the bootstrap registers and other device-specific information, such as the endianess of multi-byte data.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_DeviceMode_ENDIANESS
MaskedIntReg.Description: Endianess might be used to interpret multi-byte data for READMEM and WRITEMEM commands. This represents the endianess of bootstrap registers.Note this bit has no effect on the endianess of the GigE Vision protocol headers:they are always big-endian.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_DeviceMode_CHARACTERSETINDEX
MaskedIntReg.Description: This register represents the character set. It must take one of the following values

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_DeviceMacAddressHigh_0
MaskedIntReg.Description: This register stores the MAC address of the given network interface.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_DeviceMacAddressHigh_0_DEVICEMACHIGH
MaskedIntReg.Description: most significant bytes of MAC

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_DeviceMacAddressLow_0
MaskedIntReg.Description: This register stores the MAC address of the given network interface.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SupportedIPConfiguration
MaskedIntReg.Description: This register indicates the IP configuration scheme supported on the given network interface. Multipleschemes can be supported simultaneously.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SupportedIPConfiguration_LLA
MaskedIntReg.Description: Support LinkLocalAddress

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SupportedIPConfiguration_DHCP
MaskedIntReg.Description: Support DHCP

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SupportedIPConfiguration_PERSISTENT_IP
MaskedIntReg.Description: Persistent IP

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_CurrentIPConfiguration
MaskedIntReg.Description: This register indicates which IP configurations schemes are currently activated on the given network Interface

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_CurrentIPConfiguration_LLA
MaskedIntReg.Description: Support LinkLocalAddress

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_CurrentIPConfiguration_DHCP
MaskedIntReg.Description: Support DHCP

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_CurrentIPConfiguration_PERSISTENT_IP
MaskedIntReg.Description: Persistent IP

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_CurrentIPAddress_0
MaskedIntReg.Description: Current IP Address of this device

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_CurrentSubnetMask_0
MaskedIntReg.Description: Current Subnet Mask of this device

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_CurrentGateway_0
MaskedIntReg.Description: Current Subnet Mask of this device

Register.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_ManufacturerName
Register.Description: Provides the name of the Manufacturer of the device

Register.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_ModelName
Register.Description: Provides the name of the model name of the device

Register.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_DeviceVersion
Register.Description: Provides the version of the device

Register.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_ManufacturerSpecificInformation
Register.Description: Provides extended manufacturer information about the device.

Register.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SerialNumber
Register.Description: When supported, this string contains the serial number of the device. It can be used to identify the device. This string is provided in the DISCOVERY_ACK message (set to all NULL when not supported). String using the format in ?string character set?. The string must be 0 terminated.

Register.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_UserDefinedName
Register.Description: When supported, this string contains a user-programmable name to assign to the device. It can be used to identify the device. This string is provided in the DISCOVERY_ACK message (set to all NULL when not supported). String using the format in ?string character set?. The string must be 0 terminated.

Register.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_DeviceXMLChoice1
Register.Description: String using the format in 'string character set'. The string must be NULL-terminated, and all bytes after the terminator must be 0. 3 different schemes are supported to link to the XML device description. This string indicates XML file location. 1) XML stores in non-volatile on-board memory. In this case, the device provides the address and the length where the XML file is stored. 2) URL to device manufacturer. If file extension is .XML, then file is an uncompressed text file. If file extension is .ZIP, then file is compressed using ZIP. 3) Filename of the XML device description file. This assumes the application uses a ?default? folder where XML files are stored. If file extension is .XML, then file is an uncompressed text file. If file extension is .ZIP, then file is compressed using ZIP.

Register.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_DeviceXMLChoice2
Register.Description: String using the format in 'string character set'. The string must be NULL-terminated, and all bytes after the terminator must be 0.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_NumberOfNetworkInterfaces
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces on this device. A device must have at least one network interface.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_PersistentIPAddress_0
MaskedIntReg.Description: Persistent IP Address of this device

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_PersistentSubnetMask_0
MaskedIntReg.Description: Persistent Subnet Mask of this device

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_PersistentGateway_0
MaskedIntReg.Description: Persistent Subnet Mask of this device

MaskedIntReg.Name: GevLinkSpeedReg
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the speed (Mbps) of transmission negotiated by the given network interface

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_NumberOfMessageChannels
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device. It can take two values: 0 or 1.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_NumberOfStreamChannels
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device. It can take any value from 1 to 512.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPCapability
MaskedIntReg.Description: This is a capability register indicating which one of the non-mandatory GVCP commands are supported by this device.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPCapability_GVCP_CAP_USER_DEFINED_NAME_REG
MaskedIntReg.Description: User-defined name register is supported

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPCapability_GVCP_CAP_SERIAL_NUMBER_REG
MaskedIntReg.Description: Serial number register is supported

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPCapability_GVCP_CAP_EVENTDATA
MaskedIntReg.Description: EVENTDATA_CMD and EVENTDATA_ACK are supported

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPCapability_GVCP_CAP_EVENT
MaskedIntReg.Description: EVENT_CMD and EVENT_ACK are supported

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPCapability_GVCP_CAP_PACKETRESEND
MaskedIntReg.Description: PACKETRESEND_CMD and PACKETRESEND_ACK are supported

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPCapability_GVCP_CAP_WRITEMEM
MaskedIntReg.Description: WRITEMEM_CMD and WRITEMEM_ACK are supported

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPCapability_GVCP_CAP_CONCAT
MaskedIntReg.Description: Multiple operations in a single message are supported.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_HeartbeatTimeout
MaskedIntReg.Description: In msec, default is 3000 msec. Internally, the heartbeat is rounded according to the clock used for heartbeat. The heartbeat timeout shall have a minimum precision of 100 ms. The minimal value is 500 ms.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GevTimestampControl
IntReg.Description: Used to latch the current timestamp value. No need to clear to 0.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_CCP
MaskedIntReg.Description: Control Channel Privilege register.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_CCP_GVCP_ACCESS_CONTROL
MaskedIntReg.Description: The application writing a 1 to this bit requests control access to the device. If a device grants control access, no other application can control the device. Other applications are still able to monitor the device.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_CCP_GVCP_ACCESS_EXCLUSIVE
MaskedIntReg.Description: The application writing a 1 to this bit requests exclusive access to the device. If a device grants exclusive access, no other application can control or monitor the device.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCP0
MaskedIntReg.Description: First Stream Channel Port register.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPS0
MaskedIntReg.Description: First Stream Channel Packet Size register.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPS0_PACKET_SIZE
MaskedIntReg.Description: The stream packet size to send on this channel, except for data leader and data trailer; and the last data packet which might be of smaller size (since packet size is not necessarily a multiple of block size for stream channel). The value is in bytes. If a device cannot support the requested packet_size, then it must not fire a test packet when requested to do so.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPS0_FIRE_TEST_PACKET
MaskedIntReg.Description: When this bit is set, the device will fire one test packet of size specified by bit 16-31. The ?don?t fragment? bit of IP header must be set for this test packet.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPS0_DO_NOT_FRAGMENT
MaskedIntReg.Description: This bit is copied into the 'do not fragment' bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPS0_PIXEL_DATA_BIG_ENDIAN
MaskedIntReg.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream. 0: little endian 1: big endian. This is an optional feature. A device that does not support this feature must support little-endian and always leave that bit clear.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPD0
MaskedIntReg.Description: First Stream Channel Packet Delay register.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCFTD0
MaskedIntReg.Description: First Stream Channel Frame Transfer Delay register.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPA0
MaskedIntReg.Description: First Stream Channel Destination Address register.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates whether a live grab is under way

MaskedIntReg.Name: AcquisitionStartBitReg
MaskedIntReg.Description: AcquisitionStartBitReg
